transcript:
[Interview Transcript] 13:00:00


[Unknown Speaker] 13:00:30
---

[Interviewer] 13:01:00
Tell me about the last time you booked a trip using Gone Fishing.

[Interviewee] 13:01:30
I remember it was for a summer fishing trip. I started by researching different locations on the Gone Fishing website. I found it a bit overwhelming because there were so many options. I then read some reviews and ratings to help me narrow down the choices.

[Interviewer] 13:02:00
What was your next step?

[Interviewee] 13:02:30
I contacted their customer service to ask about some specific details. They were helpful and answered all my questions. After that, I made my booking online.

[Interviewer] 13:03:00
How was your overall experience?

[Interviewee] 13:03:30
It was pretty good. I found the website a bit confusing at first, but the customer service was excellent. The actual trip was fantastic. Fishing was great, and the arrangements were as promised.

[Unknown Speaker] 13:04:00
---

[Unknown Speaker] 13:04:30
Journey Map Analysis

[Unknown Speaker] 13:05:00
---

[Unknown Speaker] 13:05:30
**User Journey Stages**

[1. Research] 13:06:00
The user starts by researching different locations on the Gone Fishing website.

[2. Evaluation] 13:06:30
The user then reads reviews and ratings to narrow down their choices.

[3. Contact] 13:07:00
The user contacts customer service to ask about specific details.

[4. Booking] 13:07:30
The user makes the booking online.

[5. Experience] 13:08:00
The user goes on the fishing trip.

[Unknown Speaker] 13:08:30
**Touchpoints**

[1. Gone Fishing Website] 13:09:00
The user interacts with the website to research and book their trip.

[2. Customer Service] 13:09:30
The user interacts with customer service to ask questions about their potential booking.

[Unknown Speaker] 13:10:00
**Emotions**

[1. Overwhelmed] 13:10:30
The user felt overwhelmed with the number of options available on the website.

[2. Confused] 13:11:00
The user found the website a bit confusing.

[3. Satisfied] 13:11:30
The user was satisfied with the customer service interaction.

[4. Delighted] 13:12:00
The user was delighted with the actual fishing trip experience.

[Unknown Speaker] 13:12:30
**Pain Points**

[1. Overwhelming Choices] 13:13:00
The user found the number of location options on the website overwhelming.

[2. Website Usability] 13:13:30
The user found the website a bit confusing.

[Unknown Speaker] 13:14:00
**Moments of Delight**

[1. Customer Service] 13:14:30
The user found the interaction with customer service helpful.

[2. Fishing Trip] 13:15:00
The user enjoyed the actual fishing trip and the arrangements.

[Unknown Speaker] 13:15:30
**Opportunities**

[1. Improve Website Usability] 13:16:00
The website could be improved to be more user-friendly and less overwhelming to navigate.

[2. Clearer Information] 13:16:30
The website could provide clearer and more detailed information about each location to help users make decisions.

[3. Personalized Recommendations] 13:17:00
The website could implement a feature to provide personalized recommendations based on user preferences to help narrow down the options.
title: Interview with Unknown - 2025-04-22
